snippet.title: CRUX Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Crux is a fast-paced single-player arena shooter roguelike, where you face waves of enemies, unique bossfights and earn powerful magic abilities across 13 arenas. Master your fluid movement, trusty arsenal and the power of the blood gods to reach the top of the CRUX Champions Leaderboard!

CRUX is coming to Steam on March 5th 2024

#PlayCrux
